comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:7.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/7.0
Build ID: 20110916091512

Steps to reproduce:

Tried to install several different extensions
Firebug, youtube quality manager.

I'm still running 7.0b6 since the update process to the 7.0 stable version is stalled due to the disappearing extensions, so this might be fixed already



Actual results:

The extension download bar goes all the way to the end but the nothing happens.
when I check the "extension" tab in the add-ons menu the same download bar appears but now its still at the beginning and it does not move (waited several hours now)


Expected results:

The extension should have installed and firefox should have asked to restart to take the changes in effect.

note: "Destroy the internet" extension installed just fine so some addons will still install
comments.creator: groot.opperhoofd@gmail.com
comments.author: groot.opperhoofd@gmail.com
